item.title: Laura add a quote by Albert Camus
item.description: "Don't walk behind me; I may not lead. Don't walk in front of me; I may not follow. Just walk beside me and be my friend." -- Albert Camus

item.title: Laura add a quote by Frank Zappa
item.description: "So many books, so little time." -- Frank Zappa

item.title: Laura add a quote by Groucho Marx
item.description: "Outside of a dog, a book is man's best friend. Inside of a dog it's too dark to read." -- Groucho Marx

item.title: Laura add a quote by Narcotics Anonymous
item.description: "Insanity is doing the same thing, over and over again, but expecting different results." -- Narcotics Anonymous

item.title: Laura add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "I am so clever that sometimes I don't understand a single word of what I am saying." -- Oscar Wilde

item.title: Laura add a quote by Gordon A. Eadie
item.description: "If you don't stand for something you will fall for anything." -- Gordon A. Eadie

item.title: Laura add a quote by Mark Twain
item.description: "Whenever you find yourself on the side of the majority, it is time to pause and reflect." -- Mark Twain

item.title: Laura add a quote by William Shakespeare
item.description: "The fool doth think he is wise, but the wise man knows himself to be a fool." -- William Shakespeare

item.title: Laura add a quote by Martin Luther King Jr.
item.description: "Darkness cannot drive out darkness: only light can do that. Hate cannot drive out hate: only love can do that." -- Martin Luther King Jr.

item.title: Laura add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "I am enough of an artist to draw freely upon my imagination. Imagination is more important than knowledge. Knowledge is limited. Imagination encircles the world." -- Albert Einstein

item.title: Laura add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "We are all in the gutter, but some of us are looking at the stars." -- Oscar Wilde

item.title: Laura add a quote by Friedrich Nietzsche
item.description: "It is not a lack of love, but a lack of friendship that makes unhappy marriages." -- Friedrich Nietzsche

item.title: Laura add a quote by Friedrich Nietzsche
item.description: "The individual has always had to struggle to keep from being overwhelmed by the tribe. If you try it, you will be lonely often, and sometimes frightened. But no price is too high to pay for the privilege of owning yourself." -- Friedrich Nietzsche

item.title: Laura add a quote by Friedrich Nietzsche
item.description: "You must have chaos within you to give birth to a dancing star." -- Friedrich Nietzsche

item.title: Laura add a quote by Friedrich Nietzsche
item.description: "In heaven, all the interesting people are missing." -- Friedrich Nietzsche

item.title: Laura add a quote by Friedrich Nietzsche
item.description: "I'm not upset that you lied to me, I'm upset that from now on I can't believe you." -- Friedrich Nietzsche

item.title: Laura add a quote by Friedrich Wilhelm Nietzsche
item.description: "You have your way. I have my way. As for the right way, the correct way, and the only way, it does not exist." -- Friedrich Wilhelm Nietzsche

item.title: Laura add a quote by Friedrich Wilhelm Nietzsche
item.description: "We should consider every day lost on which we have not danced at least once." -- Friedrich Wilhelm Nietzsche

item.title: Laura add a quote by Friedrich Nietzsche
item.description: "Whoever fights monsters should see to it that in the process he does not become a monster. And if you gaze long enough into an abyss, the abyss will gaze back into you." -- Friedrich Nietzsche

item.title: Laura add a quote by Friedrich Nietzsche
item.description: "I cannot believe in a God who wants to be praised all the time." -- Friedrich Nietzsche

item.title: Laura add a quote by Friedrich Nietzsche
item.description: "There are no facts, only interpretations." -- Friedrich Nietzsche

item.title: Laura add a quote by Friedrich Nietzsche
item.description: "When we are tired, we are attacked by ideas we conquered long ago." -- Friedrich Nietzsche

item.title: Laura add a quote by Friedrich Nietzsche
item.description: "What, if some day or night a demon were to steal after you into your loneliest loneliness and say to you: 'This life as you now live it and have lived it, you will have to live once more and innumerable times more' ... Would you not throw yourself down and gnash your teeth and curse the demon who spoke thus? Or have you once experienced a tremendous moment when you would have answered him: 'You are a god and never have I heard anything more divine." -- Friedrich Nietzsche

item.title: Laura add a quote by Friedrich Nietzsche
item.description: "Art is the proper task of life. " -- Friedrich Nietzsche

item.title: Laura add a quote by Friedrich Nietzsche
item.description: "Without music, life would be a mistake." -- Friedrich Nietzsche

item.title: Laura add a quote by Friedrich Nietzsche
item.description: "A good writer possesses not only his own spirit but also the spirit of his friends." -- Friedrich Nietzsche

item.title: Laura add a quote by Friedrich Nietzsche
item.description: "The advantage of a bad memory is that one enjoys several times the same good things for the first time." -- Friedrich Nietzsche

item.title: Laura add a quote by Friedrich Nietzsche
item.description: "The man of knowledge must be able not only to love his enemies but also to hate his friends." -- Friedrich Nietzsche

item.title: Laura add a quote by Friedrich Nietzsche
item.description: "He who has a why to live for can bear almost any how." -- Friedrich Nietzsche

item.title: Laura add a quote by Friedrich Nietzsche
item.description: "In individuals, insanity is rare; but in groups, parties, nations and epochs, it is the rule." -- Friedrich Nietzsche
